articles.title: An even brighter Diwali: Karnataka slashes tax on petrol, diesel by Rs 7: Check prices - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Karnataka on Wednesday became the third BJP-ruled state to cut petrol and diesel prices by Rs 7. With this, petrol is expected to cost Rs 95.50 a litre and diesel Rs 81.50. The reduced prices will come into effect from Thursday evening.
articles.content:
